#include <stdio.h>
char s[1000001];
 
int main(void) 
{
	int t,i,x;
	long long counts,count,countl;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%s",&s);
		countl=0;
		counts=0;
		count=0;
		x=strlen(s);
		for(i=0; i<x; i++) if(s[i]=='L') countl++;
		for(i=0; i<x; i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='L') counts++;
			else
			{
				count+=(counts*(countl-counts));
			}
		}
 
		printf("%lld\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
